description: Environment and Climate Change Canada’s Canadian Wildlife Service (CWS) requires specialized services for the removal of invasive mammalian predators from Scott Islands marine National Wildlife Area (NWA) located off the northwestern tip of Vancouver Island, British Columbia in accordance with the requirement detailed herein.
full_summary:
=================

### Predator Eradication Implementation

#### Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this invitation for bids on a contract for the implementation of predator eradication services.

**Reference Number:** WS3248733898-Doc3685316022
**Publication Date:** September 28, 2022
**Bid Closing Date:** October 27, 2022 at 14:00:00

### Contract Details

The successful bidder will be required to provide the following services:

* Fauna control and animal trapping
* Bird proofing services
* Extermination or fumigation services

These services are required for the removal of invasive mammalian predators from the Canadian Wildlife Service's (CWS) Scott Islands marine National Wildlife Area (NWA) in British Columbia.

### Contract Value and Duration

The contract duration is expected to be from 2022-12-06 to 2026-12-05.

### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria

The tender is open to all qualified contractors. The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined technical merit rating and lowest price.

### Trade Agreements and Regions

This tender may be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

The contract will be delivered in the province of British Columbia.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact:

Hélène Kobenter, SPAC/PSPC
helene.kobenter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The tender documents and further information are available on the notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14220809?extsite=MTQyMjA4MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
